mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, STWD_ID, STWD_LNM, STWD_PNM, RQST_DCD, NVL(RVW_STS_CD, '0') AS RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, ENG_MEAN, CCH_NM, ORG_DS, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, WD_DCD, DMN_YN
mapper.select: SELECT STWD_ID FROM WDQQ_STWD WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1

SELECT A.STWD_LNM, A.STWD_PNM FROM WDQM_STWD A WHERE A.STWD_LNM = #{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_STWD B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.STWD_LNM = B.STWD_LNM AND A.STWD_PNM = B.STWD_LNM) UNION ALL SELECT STWD_LNM, STWD_PNM FROM WDQQ_STWD WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STWD_LNM = #{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_DCD = 'CU'

SELECT A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.STWD_ID, A.STWD_LNM, NVL(A.STWD_PNM,'-') AS STWD_PNM, A.RQST_DCD
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_CONTS , A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.ENG_MEAN, A.CCH_NM, A.ORG_DS, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM, A.WD_DCD -- , CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END AS FontColor , CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END END AS FontColor , A.DMN_YN FROM WDQQ_STWD A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = '99991231' AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY RQST_SNO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WDQQ_STWD (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, STWD_ID, STWD_LNM, STWD_PNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, ENG_MEAN, CCH_NM, ORG_DS, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID) VALUES (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cchNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO WDQQ_STWD
STWD_ID ,
RQST_NO, RQST_SNO,
STWD_LNM,
STWD_PNM,
RQST_DCD,
RVW_STS_CD,
ENG_MEAN,
CCH_NM,
ORG_DS,
OBJ_DESCN,
WD_DCD,
OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID
,DMN_YN
#{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WDQQ_STWD ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}) ,
REPLACE(#{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},' ',''),
UPPER(REPLACE(#{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},' ','')) ,
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1,
#{engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cchNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{wdDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1, SYSDATE,
#{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSDATE, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
,#{dmnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
UPDATE WDQQ_STWD
STWD_LNM = #{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STWD_PNM = UPPER(REPLACE(#{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},' ','')) ,
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENG_MEAN = #{engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CCH_NM = #{cchNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DS = #{orgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE WDQQ_STWD
RVW_STS_CD = 1 , -- 임의로 검토완료처리 RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = SYSDATE , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND NVL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'

UPDATE WDQQ_STWD A SET A.REG_TYP_CD = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.STWD_ID) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END FROM WDQM_STWD B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM ) , A.STWD_ID = (SELECT STWD_ID FROM WDQM_STWD B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM) , A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: -- 검증쿼리 : 등록요청 중인 표준단어 존재....(WD011) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WDQQ_STWD D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE D.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM -- AND A.STWD_PNM = D.STWD_PNM AND NVL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )
-- 검증쿼리 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_STWD D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM -- AND A.STWD_PNM = D.STWD_PNM AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_STWD D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM -- AND A.STWD_PNM = D.STWD_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

-- 검증쿼리 논리명중복 (동음이의어 통과) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD ='C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_STWD D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')
UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_STWD E WHERE A.STWD_LNM = E.STWD_LNM AND A.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO != E.RQST_SNO AND E.RQST_DCD = 'CU' ) AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN_TRM F WHERE A.STWD_LNM = F.SYMN_LNM AND A.STWD_PNM = F.SYMN_PNM AND F.SYMN_DCD = 'HM' )
-- 검증쿼리 금칙어 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD ='C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN_TRM D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.SYMN_LNM AND D.SYMN_DCD ='NT' )
-- 검증쿼리 금칙어 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD ='C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN_TRM D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.SYMN_LNM AND D.SYMN_DCD ='SW' )

-- 검증쿼리 단어 물리명 유니크 체크 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD ='C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_STWD D WHERE A.STWD_PNM = D.STWD_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_STWD E WHERE A.STWD_PNM = E.STWD_PNM AND A.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO != E.RQST_SNO AND E.RQST_DCD = 'CU' )

-- 검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'D' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD_CNFG D WHERE D.STWD_ID = A.STWD_ID UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD_CNFG D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND D.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' )

-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN D WHERE D.SYMN_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND D.SYMN_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND D.SYMN_DCD = 'NT' -- NT:금지어 AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN D WHERE D.SYMN_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND D.SYMN_DCD = 'RV' -- RV:유사어 AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') )
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND INSTR(A.STWD_LNM, ' ') > 0
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND INSTR(A.STWD_PNM, ' ') > 0
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND LENGTH(A.STWD_LNM) > 15
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND LENGTH(A.STWD_PNM) > 25

-- 검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_STWD D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM AND NVL(A.STWD_PNM,'_') = NVL(D.STWD_PNM,'_') AND NVL(A.ENG_MEAN,'_') = NVL(D.ENG_MEAN,'_') AND NVL(A.CCH_NM,'_') = NVL(D.CCH_NM,'_') AND NVL(A.ORG_DS,'_') = NVL(D.ORG_DS,'_') AND NVL(A.OBJ_DESCN,'_') = NVL(D.OBJ_DESCN,'_') AND NVL(A.WD_DCD,'_') = NVL(D.WD_DCD,'_') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') )

-- 검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_STWD D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM AND A.STWD_PNM != D.STWD_PNM )
AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN_TRM F WHERE A.STWD_LNM = F.SYMN_LNM AND A.STWD_PNM = F.SYMN_PNM AND F.SYMN_DCD = 'HM' )
mapper.sql: , STWD_LNM , STWD_PNM , ENG_MEAN , CCH_NM , ORG_DS, WD_DCD , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID , APRV_DTM , APRV_USER_ID, DMN_YN
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WDQQ_STWD WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' -- 승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: -- WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WDQQ_STWD A SET (STWD_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.STWD_ID AS STWD_ID , NVL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WDQM_STWD B WHERE B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_STWD B WHERE B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
mapper.delete: -- WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WDQM_STWD A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_STWD B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM )
mapper.update: -- WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WDQH_STWD A SET EXP_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE EXP_DTM = '99991231' AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_STWD B, WDQH_STWD A WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.EXP_DTM = '99991231' AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WDQQ_STWD( RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO ,STWD_ID ,STWD_LNM ,STWD_PNM ,RQST_DCD ,RVW_STS_CD ,RVW_CONTS ,VRF_CD ,VRF_RMK ,ENG_MEAN ,CCH_NM ,ORG_DS ,WD_DCD ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,APRV_DTM ,APRV_USER_ID ,DMN_YN ) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,RQST_SNO ,STWD_ID ,STWD_LNM ,STWD_PNM ,RQST_DCD ,'0' ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,ENG_MEAN ,CCH_NM ,ORG_DS ,WD_DCD ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,NULL ,NULL ,DMN_YN FROM WDQQ_STWD A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{oldRqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '2'
mapper.update: UPDATE WDQQ_STWD A SET ( ENG_MEAN , CCH_NM , ORG_DS, WD_DCD, DMN_YN , OBJ_DESCN, FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = (SELECT ENG_MEAN , CCH_NM , ORG_DS, WD_DCD, DMN_YN , OBJ_DESCN, FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WDQM_STWD B WHERE B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM ) WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND REG_TYP_CD = 'D' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_STWD B WHERE B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM )
